channel.title: [Delta] Yell Problem [317]

item.title: [Delta] Yell Problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Here you go.

[code=cmf]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Moderator]-";		
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@gre@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Super Donator]-@whi@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Yell Problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:367398”]if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String titles = ""; if (rating >= 15 && rating < 50) { titles = "[Reg] "; } if (rating >= 50 && rating < 100) { titles = "[Ded] "; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Premium Member] "; } if (rating >= 100) { titles = "[Legend] "; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Mod] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Admin] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Co-Owner] "; } if (playerRights == 99) { sM("You need to be donator To use the yell channel"); return; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) { titles = "[Main Owner]"; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tuthan")) { titles = "[Coder/Co-Owner]"; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + " : " + command.substring(5)); }

Fixed with no Errors ;D[/quote]

nope

item.title: [Delta] Yell Problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
                String titles = "";

                if (rating >= 15 && rating < 50) {
                    titles = "{Reg} ";
                }
                if (rating >= 50 && rating < 100) {
                    titles = "{Ded} ";
                }
		if (donator == 1) {
                    titles = "[Premium Member] ";
                }
                if (rating >= 100) {
                    titles = "[Legend] ";
                }
		if (playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
		}
     		if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "[Mod] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "[Admin] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
                }

	if (playerRights == 99) {
                   sM("YOu need to be donator To use the yell channal");
	return;
                }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pblord7")) {
                    titles = "[Main Owner]";
                }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tuthan")) {
                    titles = "[Coder/Co-Owner]";
                }
                talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
        }
